para.p:
Another example is calculating the square root of
+ c
⁢ i d
. First compute

Math.text: w equivalent-to square-root@(absolute-value@(c)) * square-root@((1 + square-root@(1 + (d / c) ^ 2)) / 2) * absolute-value@(c) >= absolute-value@(d)
w equivalent-to square-root@(absolute-value@(d)) * square-root@((absolute-value@(c / d) + square-root@(1 + (c / d) ^ 2)) / 2) * absolute-value@(c) less absolute-value@(d)

para.p:
Then, using
w
from eq. (), the square root is

Math.text: square-root@(c + i * d) = w + i * (d / (2 * w)) * w not-equals 0 * [, ] * c >= 0
square-root@(c + i * d) = absolute-value@(d) / (2 * w) + i * w * w not-equals 0 * [, ] * c less 0 * [, ] * d >= 0
square-root@(c + i * d) = absolute-value@(d) / (2 * w) - i * w * w not-equals 0 * [, ] * c less 0 * [, ] * d less 0
